    • Method Detail

      • getHostCaching

        public String getHostCaching()
        Optional. Gets or sets host caching option for a data disk within the VM Image. 'ReadOnly', 'ReadWrite', or 'None'.If this parameter is specified you must also specify the Name for the DataDiskConfiguration you want to change.
        Returns:
        The HostCaching value.

      • setHostCaching

        public void setHostCaching(String hostCachingValue)
        Optional. Gets or sets host caching option for a data disk within the VM Image. 'ReadOnly', 'ReadWrite', or 'None'.If this parameter is specified you must also specify the Name for the DataDiskConfiguration you want to change.
        Parameters:
        hostCachingValue - The HostCaching value.

      • getLogicalUnitNumber

        public Integer getLogicalUnitNumber()
        Optional. Gets or sets LUN for the data disk. LUNs must not conflict with other Data Disks in the VM Image. If this parameter is specified you must also specify the Name for the DataDiskConfiguration you want to change.
        Returns:
        The LogicalUnitNumber value.

      • setLogicalUnitNumber

        public void setLogicalUnitNumber(Integer logicalUnitNumberValue)
        Optional. Gets or sets LUN for the data disk. LUNs must not conflict with other Data Disks in the VM Image. If this parameter is specified you must also specify the Name for the DataDiskConfiguration you want to change.
        Parameters:
        logicalUnitNumberValue - The LogicalUnitNumber value.

      • getMediaLink

        public URI getMediaLink()
        Required. Gets or sets the location of the blob in Windows Azure storage. The blob location belongs to a storage account in the subscription specified by the value in the operation call.
        Returns:
        The MediaLink value.

      • setMediaLink

        public void setMediaLink(URI mediaLinkValue)
        Required. Gets or sets the location of the blob in Windows Azure storage. The blob location belongs to a storage account in the subscription specified by the value in the operation call.
        Parameters:
        mediaLinkValue - The MediaLink value.
